title: Annual closing prices - Volkswagen shares 2013 to 2018
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting Common stock, and Preferred stock. The y axis indicates the Share prices in euros and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Common stock, and Preferred stock are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Share prices in euros in descending order is: 1. Common stock, and lastly, 2. Preferred stock.
Throughout the period, Common stock generally had the highest Share prices in euros relative to others with an average of 160.64, and it reached its maximum at 2013 with a value of 196.9.
Preferred stock mostly had the least Share prices in euros with a mean value of 160.21, which peaked at 2013 with a value of 204.15.

The lines ordered according to average values of Share prices in euros in descending order is: 1. Common stock, and lastly, 2. Preferred stock.

Preferred stock reported the highest Share prices in euros about 204.15 in Year 2013
Preferred stock reported the lowest Share prices in euros about 133.35 in Year 2016
The greatest difference of Share prices in euros between Common stock and Preferred stock occurs at Year 2015 and the smallest difference occurs at 2018.
